div.style: overflow:hidden; border:0px; [IF hasCat]border-left-width:3px; border-left-style:solid; border-left-color:[catcolor];[ENDIF hasCat] [IF MeCreator]border-right-width:3px; border-right-style:solid; border-right-color:[mycolor] ; [ENDIF MeCreator]border-top-width:3px; border-top-style:solid; border-top-color:[IFNOT headSet][bgresumecolor][ENDIF headSet][IF headSet][evglobalstate][ENDIF headSet]; background-color:[bgresumecolor]; height:100%; color:[textcolor];
